comment._content: Oh my Gosh, this is a Rare Photo of the Past.    Thank God , for Camera's way back then.   Great Old Photo.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content:
What an amazing contraption! But interesting that horse power still in use in 1944.

Lovely to see you guys on the Commons! Congratulations, and wish you all the best, and look forward to exploring your collections...  :)
